constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 59 (Monday, April 4, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 7387.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H4153]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to permit commercial filmmaking and photography on the United States Capitol grounds, and for other purposes.
